resources.string: TwitterAndroid is a twitter client written in Java, to demonstrate the differences between native android development and Xamarin.
Made in context of the paper, \'Xamarin: wondermiddel of te goed om waar te zijn?\', by Maarten Van Giel, Ignace Maes, Matthias Heylen en Mathisse De Strooper

- Retrofit 2 by Square, Inc.
- Signpost by Matthias Käppler
- OkHttp-signpost by Patrik Åkerfeldt
- ButterKnife by Jake Wharton
- Picasso by Square, Inc.
- CircleImageView by Henning Dodenhof
